p: The high human population density was reported to lead to over-extraction and lower medicinal plant abundance especially in the area between Myrina—capital city of the island—and Agios Demetrios. The large number of inhabitants living in this part of the island is becoming more and more familiar with the harvesting of common medicinal plants like O. vulgare subsp . hirtum, T. capitata, H. perfoliatum, and H. perforatum adding pressure to their populations.
